General.Name: Jiangsu Lihua Animal Husbandry Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Lihua Animal Husbandry Co., Ltd. engages in breeding, slaughtering, processing, and sales of yellow feather broilers It is involved in breeding and sales of commercial pigs and geese. The company serves livestock and poultry wholesalers, retail terminals, catering chains, slaughter plants, food processing enterprises, etc. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Changzhou, China.
